questions.text: - Delicious, - eagle, - Fleece, - goose, - handshake, - retriever.
questions.explanation:
Golden & golden.

	Golden Delicious, golden eagle, Golden Fleece etc.

questions.text: - blanket, - chair, - eel, - guitar, - ray, - shock.
questions.explanation:
Electric & electric.

	Electric blanket, electric chair, electric eel etc.

questions.text: - Beach, - face, - johns, - Parliament, - shot, - weekend.
questions.explanation:
Long & long.

	Long Beach, long face, long johns (underpants with long legs) etc.

Hot & hot.

	Hot air, hot dog, hot potato etc.

Dental & dental.

	Dental clinic, dental floss, dental hygiene etc.

questions.text: - company, - detective, - income, - patient, - property, - school.
questions.explanation:
Private & private.

	Private company, private detective, private income etc.

questions.text: - broom, - Forest, - Guinea, - Look, - moon, - World, - Zealand.
questions.explanation:
New & new.

	New broom, New Forest, New Guinea etc.

Milk & milk.

	Milk chocolate, milk pudding, milk round etc.

Dress & dress.

	Dress down, dress parade, dress rehearsal etc.

Split & split.

	Split decision, split pea, split personality etc.

French & french.

	French bread, French chalk, French cricket (child's game resembling cricket in which the batsman's legs are used as the wicket).

Crocodile & crocodile.

	Crocodile bird (feeds on insects and parasites on crocodiles), crocodile clip, Crocodile River (Limpopo River).

Open & open.

	Open book, open door, open prison etc.

Nursery & nursery.

	Nursery rhyme, nursery school and nursery slopes.

Fire & fire.

	Fire ant, fire department, fire drill etc.

questions.text: - ash, - chain, - goat, - lion, - range, - sheep.
questions.explanation:
Mountain & mountain.

	Mountain ash (tree also called rowan), mountain chain, mountain goat etc.

Mental & mental.

	Mental age, mental block, mental cruelty etc.

Tax & tax.

	Tax disc, tax evasion, tax exile etc.

Penny & penny.

	Penny arcade, Penny Black, and penny whistle

Lemon & lemon.

	Lemon drop (boiled sweet), lemon grass, lemon sole etc.

Ground & ground.

	Ground control, ground floor, ground plan etc.

Panama & panama.

	Panama Canal, Panama City, Panama hat

Opera & opera & sun.

	Opera glasses, opera hat, and opera house

Mirror & mirror.

	Mirror carp, mirror image, mirror lens etc.

Umbrella & umbrella & Umbrela & umbrela.

	Umbrella bird, umbrella plant, umbrella stand etc. Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
